data.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
data.author: Og Mandino

data.quote: I didn't get there by wishing for it or hoping for it, but by working for it.
data.author: Est√©e Lauder

data.quote: The key to life is accepting challenges. Once someone stops doing this, he's dead.
data.author: Bette Davis

data.quote: Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
data.author: Brian Tracy

data.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
data.author: Joshua J. Marine

data.quote: Don't let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
data.author: Robert Kiyosaki

data.quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: Being good in business is the most fascinating kind of art. Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
data.author: Andy Warhol

data.quote: Working hard for something we don't care about is called stressed; working hard for something we love is called passion.
data.author: Simon Sinek

data.quote: Be patient with yourself. Self-growth is tender; it's holy ground. There's no greater investment.
data.author: Stephen Covey

data.quote: Nothing is really work unless you would rather be doing something else.
data.author: J.M. Barrie

data.quote: Beware of monotony; it's the mother of all the deadly sins.
data.author: Edith Wharton

data.quote: Pretend that every single person you meet has a sign around his or her neck that says, 'Make me feel important.' Not only will you succeed in sales, you will succeed in life.
data.author: Mary Kay Ash

data.quote: I'd rather regret the things I've done than regret the things I haven't done.
data.author: Lucille Ball

data.quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: Don't ask if your dream is crazy, ask if it's crazy enough.
data.author: Lena Waithe

data.quote: The act of doing something un-does the fear.
data.author: Shonda Rhimes

data.quote: Be poor, humble and driven (PhD). Don't be afraid to shift or pivot.
data.author: Alex Rodriguez

data.quote: #1 make good decisions, #2 everything else.
data.author: Rand Fishkin

data.quote: Done is better than perfect.
data.author: Sheryl Sandberg
